decision.rationale: Strong bullish momentum with price trading above all major moving averages. RSI at 58 shows room to run without being overbought. Volume confirms trend with above-average activity. Entering on pullback to SMA20 level with defined risk parameters.

bullishFactors: Price above all major moving averages (SMA20, SMA50, SMA200)
Positive MACD signal with expanding histogram
Positive analyst consensus and news sentiment
bearishFactors: Earnings event in 24 days adds uncertainty
